USE globalmart_db

-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Globalmart@123'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL storage_credentials02
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = 'sp=racwdlmeop&st=2023-09-06T11:23:09Z&se=2023-09-07T19:23:09Z&spr=https&sv=2022-11-02&sr=c&sig=VY7BMidkauvEmHyJ8MhHIc%2B1g1TYmPWn3DYEEA3Rdso%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE externalDataSource01 WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsestore01.dfs.core.windows.net/synfiles01/syn_mod_1/' ,
    CREDENTIAL = storage_credentials02
   ) ;
